Translations.Text: Ai lie fu, lia mu, mi mu.
(Zhe) shi cong quan shijie de zhu jiang shi de jingdian, qizhong hao wu yiyi.
Tamen shuo:`Ta niezao ta ma?'Buran! Ta shi cong ni de zhu jiang shi de zhenli, yibian ni jinggao zai ni zhiqian meiyou renhe jinggao zhe lailinguo de yiqun minzhong, yibian tamen zunxun zhengdao.
Zhen zhu ceng zai liu rinei chuangzao tiandi wanwu, ranhou, sheng shang baozuo, chu ta wai, nimen meiyou renhe jianhu zhe he shuo qing zhe. Nimen zenme bu jinian ne?
Ta zhili zi tian zhi di de shiwu, ranhou na shiwu zai yi ri zhi nei shangsheng dao ta nali, na yi ri de changdu, shi nimen suo jisuan de yiqian nian.
Na shi quanzhi youming de, wanneng de, zhi ci de zhu.
Ta jingzhi tasuo chuangzao de wanwu, ta zuichu yong nitu chuangzao ren.
Ranhou yong jian shui de jinghua chuangzao ta de zisun.
Ranhou shi ta jianquan, bing jiang ta de jingshen chui zai ta de shenti zhong, you wei nimen chuangzao ermu xinling. Nimen hen shao ganxie.
Tamen shuo:`Women xiaoshi zai dixia zhihou, nandao women biding chongxin shou zao ma?'Buran! Tamen bu xin jiang yu tamen de zhu xiang hui.
Ni shuo:`Fengming zhuguan nimen de shengming de sishen, jiang shi nimen siwang, ranhou nimen jiang bei zhao guiyu nimen de zhu.'
